Title: Grants retroactive membership with Tier 1 status in the New York teachers' retirement system to James J. DeMarco
Summary: Grants retroactive membership with Tier 1 status in the New York state teachers' retirement system to James J. DeMarco.
ActClause: AN ACT granting retroactive membership with tier I status in the New York teachers' retirement system to James J. DeMarco
